Your damn fast one-stop static site engine

Forget dependencies. Everything you need in one binary.

Get started

Everything built-in

Gutenberg comes with Sass compilation, syntax highlighting and other features that usually require using additional tools or use JavaScript libraries on your site.

Fast

Your site will be generated in milliseconds, not seconds. That includes Sass compilation and syntax highlighting.

Flexible

You can build anything you want with Gutenberg: blogs, landing pages, knowledge bases...

Easy to use

Gutenberg gets out of your way so you can focus on what you are actually making.
